title: Bossa pop
creator_credit: Sheldon Cohen, Wolf Koenig and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Three animated figures, a man, a woman and a child, dance, arms and legs flying, to the compulsive rhythms of this Bossa Pop. A light film in carnival mood - who can remain still when the music commands? A film without words.
creator_credit_for_label: Sheldon Cohen, Wolf Koenig and National Film Board of Canada
